data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Azteca.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Josue Reyes for Cruz Azul drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 5, Jesus Duenas (Tigres) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 7, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Tigres.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 14, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 18, Cruz Azul's Roberto Alvarado gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 24, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Attention is being given to Tigresâ€™s Guido Pizarro and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 29, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Pizarro has recovered and rejoins the match in Mexico City.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Tigres.
Josue Reyes (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 32, Yoshimar Yotun for the home team is judged to be offside.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Tigres throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto waits before resuming play because Guido Pizarro for Tigres is still down.
Jordan Sierra is on a sub for Guido Pizarro for Tigres.
In the minute 40, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Estadio Azteca, Ignacio Rivero has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Cruz Azul in Mexico City.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Eduardo Vargas is replacing Leonardo Fernandez for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in Tigres.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul drive forward through Yoshimar Yotun. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 54, Penalty! Eduardo Galvan Basulto points to the spot, great chance for Cruz Azul...
Tigres's Nahuel Guzman has been booked in Mexico City.
A massive blow for Cruz Azul as Jonathan Rodriguez misses from the spot.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 57, Tigres drive upfield and Luis Rodriguez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cruz Azul defender.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to Cruz Azul's area.
In the minute 60, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 64, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 65, Josue Reyes (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres.
The home team have replaced Yoshimar Yotun with Santiago Gimenez. This is the first substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
In the minute 67, In Mexico City Tigres attack through Nicolas Lopez. The finish is off target, however.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Cruz Azul's Adrian Aldrete breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
Nicolas Lopez scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Tigres.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez is caught offside.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 74, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres just outside Cruz Azul's area.
Adrian Aldrete is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goal! Tigres extend their lead to 0-2 through Andre Pierre Gignac.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 87, Cruz Azul's Santiago Gimenez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Tigres.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Tigres.
Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Ricardo Ferretti is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Juan Sanchez replacing Nicolas Lopez.
Cruz Azul make their second substitution with Jose Martinez replacing Juan Escobar.
Elias Hernandez is replacing Orbelin Pineda for the home team.
